ygData.subject: Re: Has tinkering been changed?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... spent about 300pp to raise two points.  Talk about an ... least they have a market. ... Lockpicks are trivial somewhere in the upper 60s range, unless they
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:58 AM 10/21/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Brian Beagle <beaglescout@...>
>
>Does anyone know of a cheaper way to raise skill? At 15pp per try, I
spent about 300pp to raise two points. Talk about an
>expensive habit. For those kind of rates, I could become a jeweler and at
least they have a market.
>
>Oh, last question. Does the spyglass have charges?
>

Lockpicks are trivial somewhere in the upper 60s range, unless they changed
it. Although they do cost another few plat more you might have better
success. Cams to 75, the scouts and probably spyglass go to over 100.
Everything else is trivial at 50 or close to it if those are new limits in
place.

Unlimited charges for the spyglass.

-Luke
